alert.note: Alert for Doddridge; Pleasants; Ritchie; Tyler; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:17AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pleasants, Ritchie, west central Doddridge, northeastern Wirt, central Tyler and east central Wood Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 616 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Elizabeth, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrisville, St. Marys, Middlebourne, Pennsboro, West Union, North Bend State Park, Ellenboro, Cairo, Pullman, Alma, Maxwell, Schultz, Mountain, Hebron, Pike, Macfarlan, Highland, Greenwood, Blandville, and Walker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building until the storms pass. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Doddridge; Pleasants; Ritchie; Tyler; Wirt; Wood
